{{WorkstationAgent}} Overview

Secure document transfer tool for Providers and Recipients

  • Your customer/consumer is just a click away
  • Supports faster, easier, secure, electronic document sharing between providers and recipients (Physician with patient, Accountants with taxpayers, Lawyers with clients,..)
  • Easily and securely transfers any document from your PC
  • Supports privacy and security standards
  • Authenticated and encrypted document transfer
  • Supporting all healthcare standards
  • In/out draft copy available in recipients PC.
  • Instant e-mail and sms notification
Read More

{{ProductFamily}}

{{WorkstationAgent}} -{{ExtensibleAgent}} (Windows, Mac, Linux, etc. Windows is the current focus)

{{ExtensionServer}} is a series of server apps such as agent admin, gateway monitor, and print processor which acts as the secure conduit between all agents and external cloud systems

  • {{ExtensionServer}}.AS - Admin Services (setting profiles, users, XA downloader, etc.)
  • {{ExtensionServer}}.PP - Print Processor (CUPS)
  • {{ExtensionServer}}.MQ - Message Queue
  • {{ExtensionServer}}.MQT - MQTT
  • {{ExtensionServer}}.MQP for XMPP
  • {{ExtensionServer}}.DS - Data Services (oData, persistence library, etc.)
Read More

{{Print2Share}}

  • Right click any document and select Print to option
  • Fill purpose of sending and description of the document
  • Select your providers (Doctors / Accountants / Lawyers) print driver and click print.
  • Your document securely transmits to print server.
  • Converting document to PDF format
  • Authenticating with password and encrypting document.
  • Instant transfer or notification to
